CustomField.description: The fallback query used to lookup the record with a LIKE wildcard. Available binding variables: - :likeParam (%param%) - :startsQuery (param%) - :endsQuery (%param)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The fallback query used to lookup the record with a LIKE wildcard. Available binding variables: - :likeParam (%param%) - :startsQuery (param%) - :endsQuery (%param)
CustomField.label: Like Query
